recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with rich tomato sauce.
preparationSteps: Boil spaghetti
Cook ground beef with onions and garlic
Mix with tomato sauce and simmer

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: A flavorful Indian curry with tender chicken pieces in a spiced creamy sauce.
preparationSteps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Cook chicken until tender.
Prepare sauce with tomato puree and cream, then combine with chicken.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A crisp salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and a tangy Caesar dressing.
preparationSteps: Chop romaine lettuce.
Toss lettuce with croutons, Parmesan, and Caesar dressing.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.description: A hearty Russian dish with tender beef and creamy mushroom sauce.
preparationSteps: Cook beef slices until browned.
Sauté mushrooms and onions.
Combine with sour cream and serve over egg noodles.

recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: A simple yet delicious Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce.
preparationSteps: Spread tomato sauce on pizza dough.
Add mozzarella and bake until cheese melts.
Top with fresh basil.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A quick and healthy mix of colorful vegetables sautéed with soy sauce.
preparationSteps: Chop vegetables
Stir-fry vegetables in a pan with soy sauce and garlic

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy breakfast pancakes served with syrup and toppings.
preparationSteps: Mix flour, milk, eggs, sugar, and baking powder.
Pour batter onto a hot griddle and cook until golden brown.
Serve with syrup or desired toppings.

recipes.title: Tuna Sandwich
recipes.description: A quick and tasty tuna sandwich with mayonnaise and fresh veggies.
preparationSteps: Mix tuna with mayonnaise.
Spread mixture on bread slices and add lettuce and tomato.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic cookies with a crisp edge and gooey chocolate centers.
preparationSteps: Mix flour, butter, sugar, eggs, and chocolate chips
Scoop dough onto a baking sheet and bake until golden

recipes.title: Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.description: A comforting soup made with fresh tomatoes and basil.
preparationSteps: Sauté onions and garlic.
Add tomatoes and simmer.
Blend the mixture and add cream and fresh basil.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon
recipes.description: Juicy salmon fillet grilled with a touch of lemon and herbs.
preparationSteps: Marinate salmon with olive oil, garlic, lemon, and herbs
Grill until cooked through

recipes.title: Cod Piccata
recipes.description: This cod piccata is lemony, bright, and fresh.
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds cod filets in serving-sized pieces
preparationSteps: Pat cod filets dry with paper towels and lightly season both sides with salt and pepper
Use a scant teaspoon of flour to very lightly dust one side of cod filets
See note
Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a large skillet over medium high heat
When butter stops bubbling, add cod filets, floured side down
Cook undisturbed, until a light brown color develops, about 3 minutes
Keeping the floured side up, carefully remove filets from skillet and keep warm
Cook lemon slices in the same skillet for 2 to 3 minutes, turning to cook evenly, and add shallots and capers
Cook about 1 minute more
Stir in white wine; cook about 1 minute, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the skillet
Stir in chicken broth and chopped parsley, and squeeze juice of reserved lemon half into the skillet; cook about 4 minutes
Gently return filets to the skillet, floured side up
Cook in the sauce until an instant read thermometer inserted in the center reads 145 degrees F (63 degrees C)
Remove to a serving plate, floured side up, and keep warm
Remove about 1/4 cup of liquid from skillet; allow to cool slightly
Add remaining 2 tablespoons butter to skillet and stir until melted
Whisk cooled liquid and remaining flour together to make a smooth slurry
Stir slurry briskly into the skillet, and  cook until sauce is thickened and bubbly
Pour sauce over cod filets, and garnish with parsley sprigs
